bibl.title: ÖAnyrvpow in Papyri of the Byzantine Period (late 3rd-mid 7th. c.). <anthropos>
bibl.note: Presents a word attested on Byzantine papyri as a designation for slaves, that is the word ênyrvpow, and its broader implications and connotations. <anthropos>
bibl.seg: SARISCHOULI Panagiota, ÖAnyrvpow in Papyri of the Byzantine Period (late 3rd-mid 7th. c.). <anthropos>
Akten des 21. Internationalen Papyrologenkongresses = ArchPF. Beiheft 3. II (Stuttgart - Leipzig, 1997) pp. 889-901.
